TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlColumnEncryptionCngProvider extends System.Data.SqlClient.SqlColumnEncryptionKeyStoreProvider

summary.span: The CMK Store provider implementation for using the Microsoft Cryptography API: Next Generation (CNG) with [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

span.span: The CMK Store provider implementation for using the Microsoft Cryptography API: Next Generation (CNG) with [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Permite armazenar chaves de chave mestra de coluna sempre criptografado em um repositório, como um módulo de segurança de hardware (HSM), que oferece suporte a API de criptografia da Microsoft: Next Generation (CNG).Enables storing Always Encrypted column master key keys in a store, such as a hardware security module (HSM), that supports the Microsoft Cryptography API: Next Generation (CNG).

summary.span: Decrypts the given encrypted value using an asymmetric key specified by the key path and the specified algorithm.

span.span: Decrypts the given encrypted value using an asymmetric key specified by the key path and the specified algorithm.

summary.span: The key path will be in the format of [ProviderName]/KeyIdentifier and should be an asymmetric key stored in the specified CNG key store provider.

span.span: The key path will be in the format of [ProviderName]/KeyIdentifier and should be an asymmetric key stored in the specified CNG key store provider.

summary.span: The valid algorithm used to encrypt/decrypt the CEK is 'RSA_OAEP'.

span.span: The valid algorithm used to encrypt/decrypt the CEK is 'RSA_OAEP'.
The decrypted column encryption key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método deve ser implementado pelo provedor de repositório de chaves correspondentes.The method must be implemented by the corresponding key store providers. use uma chave assimétrica identificada por um caminho de chave e assinar os metadados de masterkey consiste em `masterKeyPath`, `allowEnclaveComputations`e providerName. should use an asymmetric key identified by a key path and sign the masterkey metadata consisting of `masterKeyPath`, `allowEnclaveComputations`, and providerName.

summary.span: This function must be implemented by the corresponding Key Store providers.

summary.span: This function should use an asymmetric key identified by a key path and verify the masterkey metadata consisting of (masterKeyPath, allowEnclaveComputations, providerName).
